name: Vaca Roxa em Tirando uma Onda - Purple Cow Surf
name_original: Vaca Roxa em Tirando uma Onda - Purple Cow Surf
description:
ANDROID VERSION: GooglePlay 

Stay on the wave for as long as possible, avoiding obstacles like barrels, bottles, birds and other crazy things while still taking a tube!

HTML CONTROLS:

ARROWS RIGHT/LEFT: Move on board.

ARROW DOWN: Speed up/avoid wave.

Commemorative game for the game studio Vaca Roxa: @estudiovacaroxa and @bakudas.

Code: Luiz Gustavo @bingustavo.
Sound effects: Léo Cardoso @Leo8beatz.
Music: Maurício Costa @MauricioMunky.
Art & Gamedesign: Didi @DidiGameBoy.

If you like, more projects like this will come with  your support: patreon

or here (pt-br): apoia.se
